channel.description: Recent content in tech on Deepanshu's Blog

item.title: A better code search experience
item.description: Photo by Annie Spratt from Unsplash Gerrit is a great code review tool. I find it much better than GitHub. Many don’t like Gerrit because they’ve only ever experienced it with AOSP and find it hard to work with the repo tool, not necessarily Gerrit itself. Gerrit has a great and well documented API surface. It has enabled a large ecosystem of plugins with plenty of integrations with third parties.

item.title: The stumbling blocks involved with upgrading Gerrit
